titleInfo.title: “Chishikiron kettaku” (Pramāṇaviniścaya) dai 3 shō (tasha no tame no suiron shō) wayaku kenkyū ad vv.4-5: tasha no tame no suiron no teigi no prakāśana ni tsuite (6) [Study and Annotated Translation of the Pramāṇaviniścaya (Third Chapter) ad vv.4-5: Interpretation of prakāśana in the Definition of the parārthānumāna (6)]
In: Indo no Bunka to Ronri: Tosaki Hiromasa Hakase koki kinen ronbunshū [Culture and Logic in India, Festschrift in Honor of the 70th Birthday of Dr. Hiromasa Tosaki]
